title: Admin registers a new organization tenant
description: As a new administrator, I want to register my organization by providing my details, a unique organization name, and selecting a data residency region, so that a new, isolated tenant is created for my company and I can begin configuring the system.
sprint_goal: Establish core tenant registration and user login flow with security and accessibility foundations.
acceptance_criteria: A new tenant document is created in Firestore; a new user is created in Firebase Authentication with the 'Admin' role; custom claims are set; user is automatically logged in and redirected to the Admin dashboard.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests >80% coverage; Integration testing in emulator passed; Security requirements validated; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Enables new organizations to onboard themselves, creating the foundational tenant structure.

title: User interacts with an accessible application compliant with WCAG 2.1 AA standards
description: As a user with a disability, I want the application to adhere to established accessibility standards, so that I can independently and effectively use all of its features.
sprint_goal: Establish core tenant registration and user login flow with security and accessibility foundations.
acceptance_criteria: Screen Reader compatibility for all interactive elements; Sufficient Color Contrast (4.5:1 for normal text); Adequate Touch Target Size (min 44x44px).
definition_of_done: Accessibility checklist created and applied to all screens; Global DoD updated to include accessibility checks; Verified with VoiceOver and TalkBack.
testing_requirements: Manual E2E testing with VoiceOver and TalkBack; Automated contrast checks.
deployment_notes: Changes affect the entire UI component library.
business_value: Ensures the application is inclusive and usable by the widest possible audience, mitigating legal risk.

title: Admin invites a new user to the organization via email
description: As an Admin, I want to invite new employees by entering their email and assigning a role, so they can receive a secure registration link.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user invitation, activation, deactivation, and password recovery workflows.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can send an invitation; a user document is created with 'invited' status; an email with a 24-hour time-limited link is sent; duplicate invites are blocked.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; Integration test with emulator passed; Security validation passed; Deployed to staging.
testing_requirements: Unit, Integration, E2E testing, including email delivery verification.
deployment_notes: Requires SendGrid API key configured in Secret Manager.
business_value: Enables onboarding of new employees, facilitating organizational growth and core functions.

title: Subordinate checks in for attendance
description: As a Subordinate, I want to tap a 'Check-In' button so the system captures my time and GPS location to create an official attendance record.
sprint_goal: Deliver the core mobile attendance marking functionality, including check-in/out with GPS and robust permission handling.
acceptance_criteria: Successful check-in creates a 'pending' record in Firestore with timestamp and GPS; Fails gracefully if no GPS signal; Prevents duplicate check-ins for the same day.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit/widget tests >80%; E2E tests for offline and permissions passing; Performance requirements met; Security rules deployed and tested; Deployed to staging.
collaboration_required: Backend team for clock discrepancy function.
testing_requirements: Unit, Integration, E2E testing on physical devices.
deployment_notes: Requires native location permission strings configured.
business_value: Provides the foundational data point for all attendance tracking, reporting, and approval workflows.

title: Subordinate marks attendance while offline
description: As a Subordinate, I want to be able to check in and check out when my device is offline, so that my attendance is captured accurately at the correct time.
sprint_goal: Deliver the core mobile attendance marking functionality, including check-in/out with GPS and robust permission handling.
acceptance_criteria: Check-in while offline creates a record in the local cache with an 'isOfflineEntry' flag; UI updates immediately; records sync automatically when connectivity is restored.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; E2E tests for all offline scenarios passing; Manual testing on physical devices confirms functionality; Deployed to staging.
testing_requirements: Extensive E2E testing with network manipulation.
deployment_notes: Requires Firestore offline persistence to be enabled in the Flutter app.
business_value: Ensures data integrity by capturing attendance at the moment it occurs, regardless of network status.

title: Admin views summary attendance reports on the web dashboard
description: As an Admin, I want to view aggregated summary reports of attendance for daily, weekly, and monthly periods on my web dashboard, so that I can quickly assess workforce attendance trends and monitor overall presence.
sprint_goal: Implement the foundational reporting dashboard, including offline sync reliability and core filtering capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Daily summary shows total present, absent, and attendance %; Weekly summary shows average attendance % and a trend chart; Performance must be met via server-side aggregation.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Performance requirements verified against a large dataset; Security rules tested; Deployed to staging.
deployment_notes: May require deployment of new scheduled Cloud Functions for data aggregation.
business_value: Provides immediate, actionable insights into workforce attendance, enabling efficient monitoring and trend analysis.
